property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the TimingTarget &#40;a TimingGroup).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the TimingTarget within its containing object.

property.name: dynamicTarget
property.shortdesc: A page item target that is an animation, media, or mso. Can return: PageItem, Graphic, Behavior or MediaItem.

property.name: delaySeconds
property.shortdesc: The time delay in seconds for a single target or a group of targets after the previoius group has finished.

property.name: reverseAnimation
property.shortdesc: Set to true if reversing animation on rolloff. Valid only for self rolloff trigger event.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: unlink
method.shortdesc: Unlink target from this group and append to the end of this timing list.

method.name: move
method.shortdesc: Moves the timing group or target to the specified location.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The location in relation to the reference object or within the containing object.

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. . Can accept: TimingGroup, TimingTarget or TimingList. &#40;Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TimingTarget.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
